QuestData.Title: Landing the Killing Blow
QuestData.Description: You've proven yourself in the field of battle, $n. You might very well have changed the tides in our favor.$B$BI've an important assignment for you now. I'm not sure how much longer the weakness we've exposed is going to last, so we must use the element of surprise to our advantage.$B$BI want you to use the confusion created by our attack and go behind enemy lines to assassinate their leaders. In order of rank, they are: Captain Olster, Lieutenant Celeyne and Sergeant Lorric. Good luck, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dark Ranger Lyana south of the Vengeance Landing wants you to kill Captain Olster, Lieutenant Celeyne, and Sergeant Lorric at the Derelict Strand.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are the Alliance leaders dead, $n? Do not return until they are.
QuestData.RewardText: This marks undisputable victory for our forces. Anselm will be most glad to hear about this.
